CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(Phone , '+45' ) , Phone , IF( BEGINS(Phone , '45' ) , '+' + Phone , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone , '+45' )) , OR( ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'DFJ_DK') , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'Testamente_DK'))) , '+45' + Phone , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone , '+' )) , OR( ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'DFJ_DK') , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'Testamente_DK'))) , '+' + Phone , IF( BEGINS(Phone , '+46' ) , Phone , IF( BEGINS(Phone , '46' ) , '+' + Phone , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone , '+46' )) , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'FA_SE')) , '+46' + Phone , IF( AND( NOT(BEGINS(Phone , '+' )) , ISPICKVAL( Market_Unit__c , 'FA_SE')) , '+46' + Phone , Phone ))))))))
CustomField.label: Phone Formatted
